C

Client - Class in pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1
The Client class represents a client that connects to the NonBlockingServer to participate in games.
Client() - Constructor for class pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Client
Constructs a new Client instance and establishes a connection to the server.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Client
The main method to start the client.
main(String[]) - Static method in class pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.NonBlockingServer
The main method to start the server.

N

NonBlockingServer - Class in pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1
The NonBlockingServer class represents a non-blocking server that uses Java NIO to manage multiple client connections concurrently.
NonBlockingServer() - Constructor for class pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.NonBlockingServer
Constructs a new NonBlockingServer instance, initializing the selector and server socket channel.

P

pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1 - package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1
 
provideInput(String) - Method in class pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Client
Provides input to the client programmatically for testing or automation purposes.

S

start() - Method in class pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Client
Starts the client, handling user input and server responses.
start() - Method in class pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.NonBlockingServer
Starts the server, allowing clients to connect and play the selected game.
stop() - Method in class pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Client
Stops the client by shutting down its thread and closing connections.
stop() - Method in class pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.NonBlockingServer
Stops the server by closing the selector and server socket channel.
